page.title: 09THE FIRE AND RESCUE SERVICE.
page.content: The nearest fire station for our block is at Alnwick,three miles away.In the fire station there are two fire tenders.There are{4 crews}of{7 men, which makes a total of 28.Of each 7, only 5 men are called out in an emergency and 2 remain at the station. The maximum speed is{35 to 40 MPH.}on country roads and it takes from 5 to 6 minutes to reach Lesbury.They are able to pump water under pressure onto the flames. The tenders are manufactured by{D.A.F.}They carry equippment for freeing people from vehicles,as they are often called out to motor accidents.They have recently changed their name from the Fire Brigade to the{Fire and Rescue Service}in 1984.
